channel.title: Almost DONE 1 connection per ip. NEED HELP!
channel.description:
Hey again thanks for reading my post! ok i followed the guide at: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,286718.0/topicseen.html ok im stuck on part 4:
So, now, anytime someone connects it adds their Host Name to a list of other Host Names. Just doing that does'nt help us... So lets use our '.contains(Object)' method...
In our 'If' statement, replace [code] if(true) [/code] with [code] if(!connections.contains(connectingHost)) [/code] So, now, if my connections list doesn't already have that Host Name in it, then it will accept the connection... Right there only allowing one Connection for every IP Address... ok so my question is where do i put this code exactly? i know is in the server.java server side in the run() void after [code] misc.println("ClientHandler: Accepted from " + connectingHost + ":" + s.getPort()); [/code] please help ! :)

item.title: Almost DONE 1 connection per ip. NEED HELP!
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

Hey again thanks for reading my post!

ok i followed the guide at: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,286718.0/topicseen.html

ok im stuck on part 4:

So, now, anytime someone connects it adds their Host Name to a list of other Host Names. Just doing that does'nt help us... So lets use our '.contains(Object)' method...

In our ‘If’ statement, replace

if(true)

with

if(!connections.contains(connectingHost))

So, now, if my connections list doesn’t already have that Host Name in it, then it will accept the connection… Right there only allowing one Connection for every IP Address…

ok so my question is where do i put this code exactly?
i know is in the server.java server side in the run() void after

misc.println("ClientHandler: Accepted from " + connectingHost + ":" + s.getPort());

please help !

Read full topic
item.source: Almost DONE 1 connection per ip. NEED HELP!
